title: Community Moderators are a TERRIBLE idea.
body:
And it doesn't even matter because they still need to adhere to the Boards rules. How will community mods follow the rules better than the current mods do? They won't so please stop making threads about them. Most people I see offered to be community mods are shitposters as well. 

Why do you people refuse to accept that:
1) It's a terrible idea.
2) Riot WILL NEVER do it.

?
